type: Tutorial Step - Fork and Star on GitHub!

definition.text: More developers may find the project if it raises above the noise on GitHub. Forks and stars make projects easier to find!

paragraphs.text: Open an account with GitHub if you don't have one. It takes a minute or two!
Go to the Superalgos repository and click the Fork button on the top-right corner of the screen. Follow the instructions to complete the fork!
Go back to the repo and click the Star button next to the Fork button.
Awesome! You are helping developers find Superalgos! The more developers, the faster Superalgos evolves!
